## AI Tools Catalog

| Name              | Description | Category | Tags | License | Stars |
| :---------------- | :------: | ----: |----: |----: |----: |
| AI SDK        | Vercel's AI SDK 5 is a TypeScript toolkit for building AI applications with unified LLM integration across multiple providers (OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, xAI, and others). It standardizes complex LLM workflows through two core libraries: AI SDK Core (text/structured data generation, agents) and AI SDK UI (chat interfaces and generative UIs). Supports React, Next.js, Vue, Svelte, and Node.js. | Developer Tools | AI SDK, Vercel, TypeScript, React, Next.js, Vue, Svelte, Node.js | Open Source Software | NA |
